sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SYSM1100 ( DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #servcDutyTmStpSeilNum# , #wkdyNorDutyTmNum# , #wkdyMnDutyTmNum# , #wkdyMnthStdTmNum# , #pubcHodyNorDutyTmNum# , #pubcHodyDayStdTmNum# , #pubcHodyMnthBudNumDys# , #pubcHodyMnthBudTmNum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SYSM1100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum# , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM=#wkdyNorDutyTmNum# , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM=#wkdyMnDutyTmNum# , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM=#wkdyMnthStdTmNum# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM=#pubcHodyNorDutyTmNum# , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM=#pubcHodyDayStdTmNum# , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS=#pubcHodyMnthBudNumDys# , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM=#pubcHodyMnthBudTmNum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SYSM1100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyTmStpSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MN_DUTY_TM_NUM , WKDY_MNTH_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_DAY_STD_TM_NUM , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_NUM_DYS , PUBC_HODY_MNTH_BUD_TM_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EMYMT_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EMYMT_DIV_CD DESC , SERVC_DUTY_TM_STP_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SYSM1100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EMYMT_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
